<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jar of Shifting Sands](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1064)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 186 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small, ceramic jar is full, holding approximately a quarter gallon of sand. When poured out, the jar immediately begins to conjure more sand. It is said, however improbably, that this jar is responsible for creating at least one desert in the world.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command, Interact;     **Effect** You cause sand to pour out of the jar at a rate of 1 gallon per round. This doesn't end until the cap is placed back on the jar.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;     **Effect** You quickly pour sand over an adjacent square, making it difficult terrain. You can't use either of the jar's activations for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Jar of Shifting Sands
